title: Uploading slow motion videos to social mddia
content:
Just got my pixel 3 but...
After editing a slow motion video and choosing which bits I want in the slower speed, I have 2 problems when uploading the video to social media or backing up the file. 
1. When backing up the video or If i select the video from the social media app itself it goes completely into slow motion ignoring the adjustments I made. 
2. if I share the video from the photos app to the social media platform the changes I made stay the same, but the audio quality messes up? 
Is there a way to upload excatly what I'm seeing/hearing in the photos app to social media platforms?
Any suggestions? Thank you.
